original_text: Maybe someone among you will not obey the message that we have written in this letter. Make sure that everyone knows about someone like that. Do not be friends with him, so that he may become ashamed.
korean_text: 누가 이 편지에 한 우리 말을 순종하지 아니하거든 그 사람을 지목하여 사귀지 말고 그로 하여금 부끄럽게 하라

sentences.original_text: Maybe someone among you will not obey the message
sentences.korean_translation: 어쩌면 너희 중에 누군가는 그 메시지에 순종하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that we have written in this letter
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 이 편지에 써 놓은 것에

sentences.original_text: Make sure that everyone knows about someone like that
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 사람에 대해 모두가 알도록 하십시오

sentences.original_text: Do not be friends with him
so that he may become ashamed
